events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on a rainy evening, leading to moderate damages.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of initial accident details and police report.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to manage communication and coordinate the claim process.
Acknowledgment sent to customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps in the process.
Requested police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and eyewitness statements to support the claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including incident photos and official police accident report.
Internal investigation initiated to verify claim details and assess vehicle damages from the accident.
Investigation completed successfully confirming the validity of the accident claim and damage assessment.
Settlement proposal shared with the customer offering compensation based on assessed repair costs.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the claims service.
Claim officially approved following customer's acceptance of settlement terms and conditions.
Insurance payment issued to the customer covering approved vehicle repair costs after the accident.
The claim case was successfully closed after confirming completion of vehicle repairs and payment.
